title: Poll: Would you buy an Apple-branded game controller?
content:
Earlier this week, we reported that Apple has been working internally on a new game controller under its own brand based on patents filed by the company. While it’s unclear whether this product will ever see the light of day, we want to know if you would buy an Apple-made game controller.

more…

The post Poll: Would you buy an Apple-branded game controller? appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: While it's unclear whether this product will ever see the light of day, we want to know if you would buy an Apple-made game controller.
